contentList.content: Sentinel

The Sentinel is a formidable warrior class, specializing in shield-based combat and protection tactics. Sentinels are the steadfast guardians of the battlefield, utilizing their shields not just as defensive tools, but as weapons and strategic assets.
Shielded Resilience
Gain immunity to disease and resistance to poison and radiant damage.
Shielded Mind
Gain advantage on saving throws against being charmed and immunity to being feared.
Defensive Stance
Once per long rest, assume a defensive stance, granting you advantage on all physical and charismatic saving throws and resistance to all damage for one round.
Aura of Shielding
Allies within [1] of you gain a [2] bonus to their AC.
Offensive Shield Mastery
Superior Offensive Shield Mastery
You are proficient in dual shielded combat. Your shields act as weapons when unarmed, dealing [1] damage.
Shield Attack
Attack an enemy with your shield, dealing Bludgeoning damage.
Armored Fortress
Wielding a shield provides temporary HP equal to your Sentinel level when starting combat.
Protective Shield
An ally of your choosing gains +3 bonus to their AC until the end of their sixth turn.
Unyielding
Once per long rest, drop to 1 hit point instead of 0.
Guardian's Vow
Once per long rest, vow to protect an ally within 9m, granting them advantage on saving throws and resistance to the damage of attacks against them.
Safeguard
Once per short rest, as a bonus action, select two allies within 9m. They gain a temporary bonus to their Dexterity saving throws and +2 bonus to their AC.
Guardian's Sacrifice

Once per long rest, as an action, envelop an ally in a protective aura for 1 minute. While enveloped, the ally gains resistance to all damage. If the ally would be reduced to 0 hit points while this aura is active, the aura is dispelled, and the ally is instead reduced to 4 hit point.
Shield Lock
Steel Bastion

Once per long rest, as an action, become an immovable bastion of defense until the start of your next turn. Attacks against you and allies within 10 feet have disadvantage, and you all have advantage on saving throws.
Arcane Intercept
Twice per short rest, When a target casts a spell within your range you can cast as a reaction, an enhanced counterspell which deals [1] back at the source.
Twice per short rest, When a target casts a spell within your range you can cast as a reaction, an enhanced counterspell which deals [1] back at the source. Dispelled magic is stored for later use.
Uses of your Sentinel's Counterspell ability.
Aura of Silent Warding
You can emanate a magical aura of silence in a 6m radius around you as an action. The aura lasts for 6 turns and can be used once per short rest.
Spellbreaker
You gain advantage on saving throws against spells.
Arcane Energy
Stored energy gained from dispelling magic.
Arcane Recovery
After a long rest or after using your Arcane Intercept ability, you store arcane energy. This energy can be unleashed using Arcane Retaliation.
Arcane Retaliation
As an action, you can release stored arcane energy in a focused beam, dealing radiant damage.
Bulwark

The Bulwark is an unbreakable defender, using their shield to absorb blows and protect their allies, standing firm where others would fall. They specialize in enduring the onslaught of enemies and providing a safe haven for their companions in the heat of battle.
Mage's Bane
The Mage's Bane is a relentless pursuer of arcane wielders, striking fear in those trained in the mystic arts. You are trained to disrupt and reflect spells, and to withstand magical assaults.
Guardian

The Guardian is a dedicated protector, vowing to shield their allies from harm and always ready to sacrifice themselves to ensure their companions' safety. They excel in deflecting attacks away from their allies and are quick to intervene when danger looms.
